text: Francisco Álvarez Martínez (14 July 1925 – 5 January 2022) was a Spanish prelate of the Catholic Church. He became a cardinal in 2001. He was born in Llanera, Spain. Álvarez Martínez was archbishop of Toledo from 1995 to 2002. He was bishop of Tarazona from 1973 to 1976, of Calahorra y La Calzada-Logroño from 1976 to 1989, and of Orihuela-Alicante from 1989 to 1995. Álvarez Martínez died on 5 January 2022 in Madrid, Spain at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish Roman Catholic archbishops Category:Spanish cardinals Category:People from Madrid
title: Francisco Álvarez Martínez
